Class Quadrilateral

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shape
      • Quadrilateral
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Parallelogram, Rectangle, Rhombus, Square, Trapezoid

    public abstract class Quadrilateral
extends Shape
    Superclass for all implemented quadrilateral shapes
    Author:
    Sunny Jiao
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Quadrilateral(int numFreelyDrawnPoints)
      Constructor - Subclasses will call this, with their shape's specific number of points that can be freely drawn.

      Calculate the area using the shared area formula
      double calculatePerimeter()
      Calculate the perimeter by summing side lengths

      Calculate and set the side lengths a, b, and height h

    • Constructor Detail

      • Quadrilateral

        public Quadrilateral(int numFreelyDrawnPoints)
        Constructor - Subclasses will call this, with their shape's specific number of points that can be freely drawn. All quadrilaterals have 4 vertices and will be called in this superclass.
        Parameters:
        numFreelyDrawnPoints - Number of points that can be freely drawn

        Calculate and set the side lengths a, b, and height h

        Calculate the perimeter by summing side lengths

      • calculateArea

        public double calculateArea()
        Calculate the area using the shared area formula
        Specified by:
        calculateArea in class Shape
        Returns:
        Area as a double

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Get string representation of the shape. Overrides shape to include quadrilateral specific attributes (i.e. side lengths, height)
        Overrides:
        toString in class Shape
        Returns:
        String with the shape's name, vertex points, area, perimeter, and side lengths
